FinclAcctPtyFinclAsset.name: FinclAcctPtyFinclAsset
FinclAcctPtyFinclAsset.description: Represents the financial account associated with the financial asset for a specific account or contact.

AssociationEndDate.description: The date till when the party asset was associated with the financial account.

AssociationStartDate.description: The date from when the party asset was associated with the financial account.

AssociationType.description: Specifies the type of association between the financial account and the party asset.

FinancialAccountId.description: The financial account associated with the party asset.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The unique identifier of the Financial Account Party Asset.

PartyFinancialAssetId.description: The party asset associated with the financial account.

PledgedAmount.description: The monetary value of the asset pledged as the collateral for the associated financial account.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the financial account party asset in an external system.
